description:
The Four Kings of the Abashiri Underworld have challenged the Spirit Patrol to a duel! Yukiko-hime and the others are off being kicked by `Kettobashi`, or about to be split in half by `Manuke-oni`... but Enma is just relaxing nice and comfortably - with no will to fight at all!
It turns out Enma-kun doesn`t do well in the cold - and `Nadare-kozou`, another one of the Four Kings, found out about this and decided the challenge would take place in the cold and snowy mountains! Plus Enma is also somewhat down after hearing the secret of his crown from Enpi-chan.
Will the Spirit Patrol be able to get out of this one? And just who is the fourth of the Four Kings that just never seems to show himself?
Source: Official Site

titles.title: Mysterious! The Demon Who Waited Patiently
Oyoyou! Jitto Gaman no Ko de Atta
およ妖! じっと我慢のコであった
